Required Changes: Add data lineage tracking for all entities to improve data governance and traceability across the Zoom Platform Analytics Systems
Implement data quality metrics and monitoring for critical KPIs to ensure accuracy of meeting analytics and user engagement metrics
Define explicit data retention policies for meeting session data to comply with privacy regulations and optimize storage costs
Add validation rules for cross-entity relationships to prevent orphaned records between User Account and Meeting Session entities
Enhance temporal constraints to handle timezone complexities in global meeting data across different regions
Implement cascading update rules for Organization hierarchy changes to maintain referential integrity
Add support for real-time streaming data ingestion to enable live meeting analytics and dashboards
Define business rules for handling duplicate user accounts across different authentication methods
Implement data masking and anonymization rules for sensitive user information in analytics reporting
Add performance optimization constraints for large-scale meeting data queries and aggregations
